_sText:
-  **This is my version of the classic 10x reloaded, i've added lots of details to the map, improved the gameplay by fixing ramps, structures and added places to "campers".**


 

 

 

 

Map specifications
==================

- Supports 44 players.
- Structures have an "de_inferno style".
- Textures are comfortable for the eyes (They fit with the structures).
- Night version (Lots of lights to improve the visibility).
- Lots of details.
- Map improved and fixed.
- Map is balanced for both teams.
- No bugs, final and stable version.
- Fun to play.



--------------------------------------------

**My nick in-game:** Lord Cheaterfield


**My steam ID:** STEAM_0:0:16113354


--------------------------------------------


I'll be uploading the Day version of this map as soon as i can (map is finished already) and PLEASE don't port this map to CS:GO because its my map and i'm already working on it 
==================
I would appreciate if you could rate and comment about my map so it motivates me to keep doing them for CS:S, and before rate the map, please try it in game so you can appreciate the details of the map.
=================================================================================================================================================================================================================
